benchmark_details.name: CORD-19-Vaccination
benchmark_details.overview: The CORD-19-Vaccination dataset is tailored to facilitate research on COVID-19 vaccine-related topics, extracted and augmented from the CORD-19 dataset, containing valuable metadata for approximately 30k research papers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset specifically focused on COVID-19 vaccine research, aiding NLP tasks such as text mining, information extraction, and question answering.

data.source: Extracted and augmented from the CORD-19 dataset.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the performance of models on question answering and sequential sentence classification tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Metrics are interpreted based on how well the model predicts correct answers and classifies sentences in medical abstracts.
methodology.validation: The dataset was validated through evaluations on specific NLP tasks comparing performance against models trained on the original CORD-19 dataset.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis showed the concentration of research papers authored by institutions in the USA, China, India, Italy, UK, Germany, and Canada.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The CORD-19-Vaccination dataset follows the licenses of the CORD-19 dataset.
